name: Hiro Yamamoto
description:
'''Hiro D. Yamamoto''' (born April 13, 1961) is an American bassist who was a founding member of grunge band [[Soundgarden]], along with [[Kim Thayil]] and [[Chris Cornell]], in 1984. He left the band in 1989; two years later, Yamamoto started the [[independent music|independent]] rock band [[Truly (band)|Truly]] together with [[Screaming Trees]] drummer [[Mark Pickerel]] and [[Robert Roth (musician)|Robert Roth]] from The Storybook Krooks. In 2016, Yamamoto co-founded the [[surf music|surf]] trio Stereo Donkey. In 2025, Yamamoto was inducted into the [[Rock and Roll Hall of Fame]] as a founding member of Soundgarden.
